name: places/ChIJnf_J7bxYwokR0JZm4NXKY8o
formattedAddress: 144 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 144 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

editorialSummary.text: Retail chain with a selection of upmarket makeup, perfumes, beauty & skincare products.

originalText.text: Worst experience ever. No one greeted me, though the greeter/woman in the front greeted others. No one offered to help me at all, despite it being 9:30 in the morning and few customers there, with lots of staff around. I found my matching color foundation on my own, only for the woman in the front/greeter to then finally acknowledge me (so late) and only to say, ‚ÄúDid you need help?‚Äù almost as if she was annoyed! Ew. I said, no I figured out my color and I‚Äôm just looking for the tube with the corresponding number. She proceeds to tell me it‚Äôs not there, and calls someone to check if they have more of the color I‚Äôd picked out. She tells me they don‚Äôt have any more at all, and says ‚Äúsorry we don‚Äôt have it‚Äù. Offered no solution and walked away. I continued to look for the tube myself and I found it clear as day!!! I told her it was right there. She pretended to be confused. So annoying. Then I went to the register for no cashier to show up for a solid 5 minutes! This is despite the fact that lots of staff were walking around looking right at me and doing nothing to help. Gross, Sephora. Super disappointed and I see lots of other bad reviews of this location now. I‚Äôll be going to Ulta instead next time. ‚úåüèΩ

originalText.text: If I could give a 10, I would!! Stellar service. Ran in on a very busy Friday and was greeted and received help with multiple specialty items by multiple team members. Super friendly staff, down to an endearing cashier. I just moved here- You will get all my business, thank you, excellent service matters!!!

text.text: If I could give a 10, I would!! Stellar service. Ran in on a very busy Friday and was greeted and received help with multiple specialty items by multiple team members. Super friendly staff, down to an endearing cashier. I just moved here- You will get all my business, thank you, excellent service matters!!!

originalText.text: Jasmine is very friendly and provided excellent customer service! She helped me find the right shade of concealer. I was running short on time and she was able to expedite the check out process. Thank you!!

text.text: Jasmine is very friendly and provided excellent customer service! She helped me find the right shade of concealer. I was running short on time and she was able to expedite the check out process. Thank you!!

originalText.text: I went to Sephora looking for a specific product. The greeter and another sales associate told me that the product I was after is exclusively sold online and is not part of Sephora.  I left, but I turned back and asked if they had a similar product.  The greeter passed me over to Becky.  Becky was just as amazing. She addressed all my cosmetic questions without being a pushy sales associate. I  was pleasantly surprised with my shopping experience at this Sephora.

originalText.text: Well stocked but the customer service leaves a lot to be desired. I went to the store today to get the summer friday lip butt√©e ball Im vanilla, pink sugar, and vanilla beige. I was very lucky to get the last vanilla one and was also able to get the pink sugar one as well. I noticed that there was no vanilla beige boxes so I asked one of the employees and she didn‚Äôt seem like she wanted to bother. At first, she immediately said there was none left in stock. I like to be sure so I asked her is she could open the drawer that they usually stock with extra products. She opened it and then closed It immediately with an irritated tone. So, I left it alone and went to take my products to checkout. While I‚Äôm in line, I swear I am not lying when I say there are over 10+ boxes of the brown sugar color!!! My issue with this woman was that she was so insistent that there were no more. When I buy my products and leave, I see her near the exit and proceed to say ¬´¬†There‚Äôs actually a lot of the vanilla beige up at the line waiting area¬†¬ª and I used a very polite tone. She proceeds to roll her eyes and me and wave her hands up. I‚Äôm sorry that my comment was such an inconvenience for you? Maybe you shouldn‚Äôt be in a customer service job if you don‚Äôt actually like people? Or don‚Äôt want to sell products??
